com.github.mrgoro.interactivedata.api.service

Class ChartDefinitionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mrgoro.interactivedata.api.service.ChartDefinitionService

  • public class ChartDefinitionService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service for providing definitions of all charts. Information is loaded during initialization of the service. ServiceProvider is used to find Classes to further search for. For performance reasons the initialization should take place during applications startup.
    Author:
    Philipp Schürmann

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ChartDefinitionService(ServiceProvider serviceProvider)
      Create a new ChartDefinitionService using a service provider.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChartDefinitionService

        public ChartDefinitionService(ServiceProvider serviceProvider)
        Create a new ChartDefinitionService using a service provider. The service provider is used to provide classes that should be further searched for appropriate annotations.
        Parameters:
        serviceProvider - Service provider

    • Method Detail

      • getChartDefinitions

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,AbstractChartDefinition<?,? extends ChartData>> getChartDefinitions()
        Get a Map with all ChartDefinitions. The name of the chart is the key of the Map.
        Returns:
        Map with all ChartDefinitions

        Get a ChartDefinition for the chart with the given name.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
